document_data.name: Lloyd
document_data.mainbody: '''Minister Lloyd''' was the mayor of [[Imnesvale (town)|Imnesvale]] ''circa'' the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Lloyd was somewhat of a worrisome individual. Whenever the town was presented with a problem he was fearful that the worst possible outcome would arise.
document_data.Possessions: Among the mayor's possessions was an [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] suit of [[leather armor]] called the ''[[Night's Gift]]''.
document_data.History: When a rash of killings and disappearances sprang up around Imnesvale in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Lloyd sought assistance from outside his little village. At first he hired a group of [[adventurer]]s led by the brave [[Mazzy Fentan]]. When that group went missing he sent a messenger [[Delon]] to seek help in the capital city of [[Athkatla]].
